name: henbane
content:

a poisonous plant in the nightshade family, with a strong, unpleasant smell, sticky leaves, and yellowish-white flowers, used as a herb to treat medical conditions: The nightshade family includes such plants as the deadly nightshade, henbane, and tobacco, as well as the potato, aubergine, and tomato. The black or common henbane grows on waste land by roadsides.
